product_name: The North Face Radium High-Loft Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Radium High-Loft fleece jacket provides incredible warmth while reducing weight and bulk for your backcountry skiing and mountaineering adventures. Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) High Loft is a polyester fleece stitched in a baffle pattern that traps warmth, increases airflow and promotes compressibility. Delivers the highest warmth-to-weight ratio of any The North Face high-loft fleece. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) Pro side panels enhance movement. The North Face Radium High-Loft men's jacket features zippered handwarmer pockets that are accessible while wearing a climbing harness or pack.
short_description: The North Face Radium High-Loft fleece jacket provides incredible warmth while reducing weight and bulk for your backcountry skiing and mountaineering adventures.
